TopicTitle: [WIP][1.9.x-1.12.x] Scatterer-atmospheric scattering (0.0838 - 14/08/2022) Scattering improvements, in-game atmo generation and multi-sun support

> On 6/9/2020 at 7:19 PM, SheldonTime said:
> 
> 
> I have scatterer version v0.0331b (KSP 1.4.2), and the oceans aren't appearing, and so does the sky!  
>   
> 
> Is it because of other mods or is it a problem with KSP? Like if I have to verify cache or reinstall?  
>   
> 
> If it is because of other mods, is there a list of mods that break scatterer?
> 
> 
> 
> 
> (EDIT: I fixed it by removing a texture pack for <abbr title="Environmental Visual Enhancement (mod)">EVE</abbr>. Which is in my opinion, disappointing to remove. How can I install a texture pack for <abbr title="Environmental Visual Enhancement (mod)">EVE</abbr> without breaking scatterer?)
> 

I think you mean a visual mod including a scatterer+<abbr title="Environmental Visual Enhancement (mod)">EVE</abbr> config, you have to check with the creator of said configs. However you are using a very old version of KSP and scatterer, so make sure the configs are for the right version.

Yes. These "lines" appears when the camera is moved in certain angles.  Up to about Low Orbit.. Up there it only appears as some small flickering here and there in the ocean texture.

Same folder, but it’s called Player.log instead of output\_log.txt. On Windows, they changed that in 1.8, so the last version that would give an output\_log.txt was 1.7.3. [See here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/163863-how-to-get-support/). 

Am I minimodding? I hope not.

**Hii ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")** [@blackrack](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/104258-blackrack/) !! I am here again, because i am having an old issue again, until yesterday i was using the scaterrer modified and adapted for 1.9 by [@R-T-B](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/200868-r-t-b/), due to the development of my mod, but i decided to update to your version and again the sunflares stopped working in the game, it just work when i am in the tracking station or looking throught the map view. What can we do to fix it ? ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/ZNGIcon2.png ":o")

> 
> 
> 9 hours ago, SpaceFace545 said:
> 
> 
> okay, I like scatterer but, it just hurts my computer, thanks. Whats with the config tool, can I change the scattering to reduce the atmosphere
> 

Not the config tool, but you can disable options from the UI in the <abbr title="Kerbal Space Center">KSC</abbr>. Ocean shaders are the most expensive.

You can referer to this wiki section (still incomplete but it's a starting point): [https://github.com/LGhassen/Scatterer/wiki/GeneralConfig](https://github.com/LGhassen/Scatterer/wiki/GeneralConfig)
